title: FPs Spikes and Lag load into Lobby/Loading Screen
body:
I didn't know where else to put this, but since the new patch my league has been having bad fps drops and unstable fps in game. When I join a normal queue I always get last pick since I take about 2-5 seconds to get into the lobby. 

Before the patch everything ran fine, and my settings have been changed to lower ones incase it was that but I still get drops and bad load time.

I have no clue what caused this, but I'm thinking something in the patch might not sit well with my computer or my league. I've had the same problem before and it solved itself over the next patch

Please help and tell me if any of you have had the same problem? Is there a fix for it?

replies.body:
Have you tried repairing?

You can also try flushing your DNS, clearing your internet cache, defragging and turning off your firewalls/anti-virus.
